name: online survey voucher
subject: [Testing] Voucher awarded for the CUHK’s main website revamp online survey
body:
Dear Participant,

Thank you for completing the online survey for CUHK’s main website revamp. We are pleased to inform you that you have been awarded a $25 Starbucks e-voucher or a $25 The Infinity Room voucher! Please fill out this form by 9 Jun 2025 to provide the necessary personal information, which will only be used for redemption arrangements. Thank you!

If you have any questions, please contact Carmen (carmenlui@cuhk.edu.hk). We appreciate your participation in the online survey.

Regards, 

Communications and Public Relations
